bibl.title: The Vindolanda Writing-Tablets.
bibl.note: The 1991-4 seasons of excavation at Vindolanda produced a total of about 400 new ink tablets and 46 stilus tablets.

bibl.title: XI Congresso Internazionale di Epigrafia Greca e Latina, Roma, 18-24 settembre 1997. Atti. I

bibl.seg: BOWMAN Alan K., The Vindolanda Writing-Tablets.
XI Congresso Internazionale di Epigrafia Greca e Latina, Roma, 18-24 settembre 1997. Atti. I (Roma, 1999) pp. 545-551.
The 1991-4 seasons of excavation at Vindolanda produced a total of about 400 new ink tablets and 46 stilus tablets.
